briefTitle: A Study Evaluating the Addition of MabThera (Rituximab) to Standard Treatment in Patients With Idiopathic Thrombocytopenic Purpura (ITP)

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With a Sustained Response
outcomeMeasures.description: Sustained response defined as a platelet count of greater than or equal to (≥) 50x10\^9/L at 6 months (Week 24) after the initial treatment. Participants failing therapy before Month 6 (Week 24) and treated in other ways were considered failures.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With an Initial Response
outcomeMeasures.description: Initial response was defined as an increase in platelet count of ≥50x10\^9/L by Day 30 (Week 4) after the start of treatment in either treatment arm.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Participants With an Initial Complete Response
outcomeMeasures.description: Initial complete response was defined as an increase in platelet count of ≥100x10\^9/L by Day 30 (Week 4) after the initiation of treatment in either treatment arm.
